WRITING.TITLE: Beginne questions about some spells and temple
WRITING.TEXT:
1. How does blnk work. When I se it, I go backwards. Does this dodge melee? Are there specific mobs this is really use fully against?
2. How does shrink work? Does this reduce my chance to be hit?if so how much?
Which temple blessings are most useful? I have been using the one to boost idle exp. they double in cost each use so I have avoided thr rest.

WRITING.TITLE: So e newbie questions
WRITING.TEXT:
1. How are the levels of mobs in dungeons chosen? I know it goes up if you invest in it. I think its based on the farthest you got in the wild. If that is correct the most efficient time to do dungeons is right after you enchant and recover power, then do a raid.
2. Is there a way to keep charms and stockpile them? When i get them they seem to be active i mediately.
3. Does anyone know which spells have passives that increase spell exp? I found one. I think it may be more efficient to target those spells to rank 5 ( if i have them) first.
4. Do you get more spell exp as you get farther into the wild? I think you you do, but I am not sure.
5. So far i have had the most success having a loadout of all the same spell type to take advantage of bonuses. For example, i use all ice right now. Any posts in here experimenting with different mixes?
6. What is HH? I see it referenced a few times. I have gotten to area 39 in the wild.
7. It looks like a number of stats are missing from the notebook that gives stats. Such as percent bonus for all of the sane type spells, etc... 2 of the same type, etc... Is that correct or am i missing stuff.
8. Anyway to run an ios cloud save on kongregate and vice/versa?

Marino never had a running game. Dolphins would try to establish the run, then late in alot of games Marino had to chuck it around alot to pull out games. Back when Marino played teams rarely ever gave up on the run early even if it was t working. Game planning wasnt as flexible.
The defense in miami was usually pretty bad too. Note it was bad for that era. Teams didnt score as much. He had better receivers than Elway early in his career. His two big time receivers didnt last too long and after that Elway tended to have better receivers .

Tell them to look into a reverse mortgage. You get cash. Bank gets the house when they die. Be careful with it. Make sure its in both of their names. $5m is self sustaining wealth. If you invest it moderately conservatively and shoot for say a 5% return( you would want more if inflation is higher). That is $250,000 a year. You want to reinvest a portion of that so your networth stays slightly ahead of inflation.
I would probably spend $150,000 at most if I was retired? This is taxable. If its long term capital gains that is at 15%. If its from a 401k or a sep ira that is considered regular income so taxes are higher. You dont want to spend too much of it, in case you get sick( even if you have insurance co pays for major illnesses is alot) and emergencies.
I have a networth of over $1m( yes I have a house but I have over a million not including my house). I have made a six figure salary for over 10 years. I have this much money because I live modestly. I work in IT in the dc area. Lots of staff ups and stsff downs. The company I work for has had growing layoffs every year and this year there is a big merger I expect them to be huge. I have been laid off several times. Other times I have done temporary contracting. Lots of stress with job security.
For that reason I would rather save money so even though I am stressed and have been out if work for months at a time ( 2008 i was out for 3 months) , I atleast know I wont be homeless and I can eat.
Most people who make my income and many of them are married so they each make a six figure salary increase there spending and buy frivolous crap as their income goes up. Then they are desperate if something happens to their job. I have no credit card debt. I do buy new cars, but I buy the entry level models. I have a 2010 Chevy Malibu and it runs just fine.
I dont balance my checkbook. I auto pay everything. If I want to order food, I dont worry about. I pay a maid service to clean my house once a month. I guess by reddit standards my big splurge is I have Fios TV with hbo. I also have netflix, amazon prime, and I just bought showtime amazon prime.
My big piece of furniture purchases in the last 10 years, I got a leather recliner and I bought a memory foam bed( got it from bed boss fir $800) . Bought an ipad 2 a few years ago. I built my current pc 4 years ago and the parts cost $1600. I have a droid phone, no text plan( texting is stupid) and I have limited minutes( dont like to talk on the phone)
I need to run out to target tomorrow and replace my 12 year old George Forman Grill. Wont sweat the cost.
I like to read alot, but I get most of the books outof the library that is $2 miles a way. I have a 10 speed bike I bought off of craigslist 10 years ago.
About 4 years ago I had wood floors put into most of my house( my house is 1250 square feet). I have a heoa air filter built into my heater. I have bad allergies.
I am single. I have no dependents. I like seeing my networth go up every year because it reduces stress and makes me feel more comfortable.
In case you want to know how I invest, I use the vanguard total market fund and vanguard international fund. These have the lowest fees. I have a t rowe price tax free bond fund for virginia residents. I automatically about $1400/month into them . I max my 401k which is currently $16,000 and I got a $5000 match last year. I use a regular market index fund in that. I hve an mba. During the program, I took my first finance class, realized financial planners are scam artists, fired him, and just use low cost index funds.
Asa rule, if you feel and act rich you will likely just spend all your money and have nothing. Id rather have less stress.

WRITING.TITLE: Per PFF , DJ Fluker was much better at RT than at Guard and much better than Bobby Hart
WRITING.TEXT:
If My memory is correct John Jerry graded at 77 and Bobby Hart was the worst tackle in the league at 47.
Per Link below at RT, Fluker graded at 71 and 77. Then moved to guard and graded in the 50s and 60s. I see the news articles saying that Fluker was brought in to play guard. He is absolute shit at Guard and Jerry is much better. A 77 is bleh. Not worst, but prefer to upgrade. If fluker is the same mediocre RT he was 2 years ago its a huge improvement over Hart and he would be higher graded than Flowers ( but flowers goes against the better pass rusher ). He cant run block for shit, but neither can Hart.
The chargers moving a guy to guard who was better than both of the Giants tackles tells you how shit the line was. I think the new plan is to have Hart/Fluker compete for the RT job in training camp since they signed Jerry. Unless of course they get a good tackle in the draft.
All the press reports say Fluker is a very hard worker and coachable. Maybe a new coach will catch things his orevious coaches didnt and coach him up. I will take a 75 grade at RT as a big upgrade. Its still not reliable. If fluker is decent, the giants can focus on helping Flowers more in pass protection. Put a TE on his side to chip. Back can line up more on Flowers side to focus on support.
One knock on fluker is that he is easily fooled by stunts.
Link below has Flukers PFF grades.
http://www.nj.com/giants/index.ssf/2017/03/giants_offensive_line_a_look_at_dj_fluker_could_an.html

Smetimes the 1990 nfc championship game is on youtube. Parcells said it was the bestvgame he ever coached. Madden and Summerall announced. Phil Simms got injured in week 12 and they won a superbowl with a backup qb.
Joe Montana had his career ended wirh 49ers. LT recovered a fumble when Roger Craig( on the 1980s all decade team) fumbled while trying to out the clock. Giants faked a punt on that drive and hiked it to,a linebacker who ran for a first down.
Giants also lost their starting RB that year. Rodney Hampton was a rookie and went on to have several 1000 yard seasons got hurt. OJ Anderson who had been an all pro when he was young, but was ancient had a 1000 yard season and was superbowl mvp.
This is before free agency. So alot of guys on the team for a long time. Hostetler was a backup for 6 years. 3 of the 4 linebackers were together since 1984 and so was Leonard Marshall. Giants signed Everson Walls who had been an all pro safety with the cowboys.
Their best defensive player that year was Pepper Johnson. His has been the linebackers coach in New England for years.
It was a better game than the superbowl. In my opinion a bigger upset Joe Montana, Jerry Rice Rice Ronnie Lott, Roger Craig and others were going for a 3 peat.
